title: "C3 AI’s Tom Siebel sees power and peril in AI’s march to the mainstream"
excerpt: "Any list of computer industry figures who could legitimately be classified as a living legend would have to include Tom Siebel. He and co-founder Pat House started Siebel Systems Inc. in 1993 and grew it to a $2 billion-a-year giant that practically defined the customer relationship management market for large enterprises."
